## Loading the data

This project is so interesting and relevant to my life!

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")

summary(committees)
```

```{r}
#select committees

committees1 <- committees %>%
  filter(cmte_party_affiliation != "UNK") %>%
  select(cmte_dsgn, org_type, cmte_party_affiliation) 
  
committees1


```
